events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on a city street resulting in significant damage to the vehicle.
The insurance claim was classified under auto accident after reviewing initial incident details and police report.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to manage the customer’s auto accident claim to provide timely assistance.
The claim was officially acknowledged and a confirmation email was sent to the policyholder with next steps.
The agent requested additional documents including photographs of the damaged vehicle and a copy of the police report.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents, including detailed images and a formal police accident report.
The investigation team began a thorough review of submitted evidence to assess the claim’s validity and extent of damages.
Investigation finalized with findings that confirm the collision details and verify coverage under the customer's policy.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the estimated repair cost and rental vehicle reimbursement.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the promptness of the service and fairness of the proposed settlement.
The claim was officially approved and all internal checks confirmed eligibility for payout under policy terms.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customer’s bank account without any delays.
The claim case was closed following successful payment and confirmation that all customer concerns were addressed.
The completed claim was archived in the system for future reference and regulatory compliance purposes.
